name: Homogeneous Charge Compression Ignition OH
description: The first timestep of direct numerical simulation of an autoignition phenomena in stratified dimethyl-ether/air turbulent mixtures.
acknowledgement: Gaurav Bansal, Ajith Mascarenhas, and Jacqueline H. Chen.

bibtex.title: Direct Numerical Simulations of Autoignition in Stratified Dimethyl-Ether (DME)/Air Turbulent Mixtures
bibtex.author: Bansal, Gaurav and Mascarenhas, Ajith and Chen, Jacqueline H.
